Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, and we believe its worth aligns perfectly with your expectations and needs. We are offering this masterpiece at a special price of $750,000, which we believe is an excellent opportunity for you to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive rate. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
